modalHint: Long press or click the right mouse button to save the avatar to your album
siteDescription: Generate stunning AI avatars from your selfies with custom AI-generated features.
downloadTip: Currently supports svg and png formats, try changing the format at the download button

hero.title: Create Your AI Avatar
hero.subtitle: Upload a selfie and let AI design your perfect custom avatar
hero.privacy: Your photo is processed instantly and never stored

upload.errorType: Please upload a valid image file (PNG, JPG, or WEBP)
upload.errorSize: File size must be less than 5MB
upload.errorRead: Failed to read the image file

error.title: Analysis Failed
error.analysisFailed: Could not analyze the image. Please try another photo.

results.title: Your AI-Generated Avatar
results.imperfectMatchDescription: We couldn't find perfect matches for: {{parts}}. You can manually adjust these features to better match your photo.
